snippet: The Gallup Organization has identified a series of factors that contributed its overestimation of support for Mitt Romney in the 2012 presidential election, including problems with its survey sample and methodology, according to an in-depth analysis...
abstract: The Gallup Organization has identified a series of factors that contributed its overestimation of support for Mitt Romney in the 2012 presidential election, including problems with its survey sample and methodology, according to an in-depth analysis of their procedures released on Tuesday.

byline.original: By MARJORIE CONNELLY and MEGAN THEE-BRENAN

headline.main: Gallup Identifies Factors That Led to Its G.O.P. Skew in November
